meanings.definition: Written together by two or more people.
meanings.sent1: The cowritten story was a collaboration between friends.
meanings.sent2: The movie was cowritten by two talented screenwriters.
meanings.sent3: The cowritten play had the audience laughing at every scene.
meanings.sent4: Their cowritten song was a harmonious blend of different styles.
meanings.sent5: The cowritten novel painted a vivid picture of friendship and adventure.
